name: @imtbl/economy-playground
description: Playground application for Immutable Economy SDK

scripts.build: npm run setup && npm run build:app
scripts.prestart: [ -f public/js/imtbl-checkout-widgets.js ] || { echo 'Error: checkout-widgets deps not found. Please run `npm run setup` first.' ; exit 1; }
scripts.setup: npm run clean && yarn workspace @imtbl/checkout-widgets-lib build && yarn workspace @imtbl/checkout-widgets-lib dist:sdk && cp ../../../sdk/dist/browser/checkout.js public/js/imtbl-checkout-widgets.js
